This virus is serious business and it's not messing around. Wear a mask and let's pass urgently needed relief for American families.

The #HEROESAct addresses the kitchen table issues our families care about:

🏘️ Direct cash to families
💵 Hazard pay for essential workers
🏥 Investment in testing
💼 Strengthened small business support & unemployment benefits
🥫 Expanded food assistance
🔑 Rent & mortgage relief

Remember, many of the people who are attacking the #HEROESAct are the same people who voted against the free COVID-19 testing and support for state unemployment insurance departments in #FamiliesFirst.

Workers face increased danger to their health and well-being due to COVID-19. As chair of Workforce Protections, I'm doing everything I can to address the worker safety crisis.
